name: gruff
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a person's voice) low and unfriendly, or (of a person's behaviour) unfriendly or showing no patience: "Yeah, so what?" came the gruff reply. He's quite a sweet man beneath the gruff exterior. Compare
hoarse
